attributes.long-description:
Game contains In-Game Purchases.

The MLB The Show 19 Digital Deluxe Edition includes:
15,000 Stubs
1 Prestige Gear Up Choice Pack
1 Choose 1 of 30 Diamond Flashbacks
1 Ballin is a Habit Pack
30 Standard Packs
30 Custom Avatars (legend, team, etc.)
1 Choose 1 Classic Stadium

Software subject to license (us.playstation.com/softwarelicense). Online features require an account and are subject to terms of service and applicable privacy policy (playstationnetwork.com/terms-of-service & playstationnetwork.com/privacy-policy). One-time license fee for play on account’s designated primary PS4™ system and other PS4™ systems when signed in with that account.

Software subject to license (us.playstation.com/softwarelicense). Online features require an account and are subject to terms of service and applicable privacy policy (playstationnetwork.com/terms-of-service & playstationnetwork.com/privacy-policy).

Online multiplayer requires a PlayStation Plus membership.

Online features may be terminated at any time.

attributes.name: MLB The Show 19 Digital Deluxe Edition
attributes.preorder-description:
Digital Pre-order Details:
Pre-order and receive a bonus after checking out:

MLB® THE SHOW™ 18 EXCLUSIVE BRYCE HARPER MVP FLASHBACK



Digital Pre-order Details:
Pre-order and receive a bonus after checking out:
- MLB The Show 18 MVP Flashback Bryce Harper


Pre-Order MLB The Show 19 to get: 
- 10 Standard Packs
- 5,000 Stubs
- 1 Gold Player Choice Pack

Play on 03/26/2019 12am Eastern Time

CANCELLATIONS AND REFUNDS ARE NOT AVAILABLE EXCEPT WHERE REQUIRED BY LAW.
